description: This file defines a Python class 'SecretsManager' that manages AWS Secrets Manager resources, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting secrets, as well as reading secrets from YAML files. It interacts with AWS via boto3 and includes methods for secret management and file I/O.

classes.name: SecretsManager
classes.description: A class that manages AWS Secrets Manager secrets, providing methods to create, read, update, delete secrets, and load secrets from YAML files.

methods.name: read_secrets_from_files
methods.description: Reads secrets from YAML files specified in 'secret_files' or 'secrets_dir' and returns a dictionary of secrets.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a new secret in AWS Secrets Manager using provided parameters and secrets loaded from files.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and returns the secret details from AWS Secrets Manager.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the secret from AWS Secrets Manager.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates an existing secret in AWS Secrets Manager with new secret data.

methods.name: get_secrets_as_dict
methods.description: Retrieves the secret value as a dictionary, either from cache or AWS Secrets Manager.

methods.name: get_secret_value
methods.description: Retrieves a specific secret value by name from the secret's dictionary.
